entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
